text: This section describes the Simplified Upgrade Procedure from Mediationzone Version 9.3 to 9.4. Refer to Upgrade Overview for information on Simplified Upgrade Procedure. Ensure to read through all the documentation for the Simplified Upgrade Procedure and check out the Release Notes for Important information and Known Issues before proceeding with the Upgrade. Ensure that you follow the instructions in the order outlined in this section. This section has the following subsections: Simplified Upgrade Preparations Steps Parameter Migration Preparation Shutting Down Old Environment Install New Platform and Execution Container Post Simplified Upgrade Steps
title: Simplified Upgrade Procedure - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
